files.patch:
@@ -957,3 +957,0 @@ - *

- * Occasionally (after approximately 500 invocations) the root - * AWTEventMulticaster is rebalanced. @@ -983,3 +980,0 @@ - *

- * The first time this method is invoked it will convert a tree that has a degree - * of approximately 500 to a tree with a degree of approximately 10. @@ -990,1 +984,1 @@ - if (++level > 500) + if (++level > 500) { @@ -992,0 +986,1 @@ + } @@ -1018,1 +1013,1 @@ - if (index0 == index1) + if (index0 == index1) { @@ -1020,1 +1015,2 @@ - if (index0 == index1 - 1) + } + if (index0 == index1 - 1) { @@ -1022,0 +1018,1 @@ + }
